body.p:
57
Nicholasville Ky
June 1861
Saml Gill Esq
Frankfort Ky.

Dear Sir -- We have seventy five enrolled in the Home Guard at this place about forty five have sworn in, the balance ^will be^ as soon as they can be gotten together -- You will please send us a full stand of arms --
